import React from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, NavLink, Dropdown, DropdownButton } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { LOGO } from '../assets' // NOTE import connect redux import { connect } from "react-redux" //NOTE import action log out import { logout } from "../actions" function Navigation(props) { return ( {' '} Electronic Shop
HOME
🛒 {props.username ? <> Log out Verification Profile : <> Login Sign Up } ) } let mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { username: state.user.username } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { logout })(Navigation)
